TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OutlookBarShortcutsEvents_BeforeShortcutAddEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OutlookBarShortcutsEvents_BeforeShortcutAddEventHandler(ByRef Cancel As Boolean)

Docs.param: False when the event occurs. If the event procedure sets this argument to True, the shortcut is not added to the group.
Docs.summary: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
